EC50 Pimephales promelas (Fathead minnow, age 28 days, mean length 15.8 mm, mean weight 0.054 g) 4.89 mg/L for 96 hr (confidence limit: 4.06-5.89 mg/L); flow through, 26 °C, pH 7.88, hardness 45.8 mg/L CaCO3, alkalinity 44.1 mg/L CaCO3, dissolved oxygen 7.5 mg/L; Effect: Affected fish lost schooling behavior and swam near the bottom of the aquaria. They were hyperactive and over-reactive to external stimuli, had rigid musculature and edema, were darkly colored, and lost equilibrium prior to death. /98% purity/
